channel.title: TOR:ABX on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TOR:ABX on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Barrick Falls After Posting $1 Billion Net Charge on Mali Mine
item.description: Barrick Mining Corp. slumped in pre-market trading after the Canadian miner posted a net charge of $1.04 billion related to the seizure of its vast Loulo-Gounkoto gold complex by Mali’s military junta

item.title: Barrick Falls After Posting $1 Billion Net Charge on Mali Mine
item.description: Barrick Mining Corp. slumped in pre-market trading after the Canadian miner posted a net charge of $1.04 billion related to the seizure of its vast Loulo-Gounkoto gold complex by Mali’s military junta

item.title: Guinea Transfers EGA Unit’s Mining Rights to State Company
item.description: Guinea has transfered a bauxite mining lease belonging to the local unit of Emirates Global Aluminium to a newly created state-owned company.
